message.delete_building: Deleting task/building {buildingName} will also remove the following hierarchical settings. You will need to reconfigure them.
message.delete_company: Deleting project/company {companyName} will also remove all hierarchical settings associated with this company. You will need to reconfigure them.
message.delete_floor: Deleting floor {floorName} will also remove the following hierarchical settings. You will need to reconfigure them.
message.delete_hub: Deleting hub {hubName} will also remove the following hierarchical settings. You will need to reconfigure them.
message.delete_location: Deleting location {locationName} will also remove the following hierarchical settings. You will need to reconfigure them.
